root.cn: 这是一款精致的文字益智软件，我们加入了大量动画和趣味元素，使得生动耐玩。包含唐诗三百首，涉及大量名篇佳作，每天玩上10分钟，认识一首古诗词，品味一句经典。激发您对古诗词的兴趣，对中华传统文化的了解。小伙伴们赶快来重温那些熟悉的最美诗词!
root.en: This is a delicate word puzzle app. We add a lot of animation and fun elements to make the app lively and playful. Including 300 Tang poems, involving a large number of masterpieces, 10 minutes a day to play, know an ancient poem, taste a classic. Stimulate your interest in ancient poetry and understand Chinese traditional culture. Come and review the most beautiful poems you know!
